en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
ny: "Tsopano tili ndi mbewa za miyezi 4 zomwe sizili ndi matenda a shuga omwe kale anali ndi matenda a shuga," anawonjezera.

en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
ny: Dr. Ehud Ur, pulofesa wa zamankhwala ku yunivesite ya Dalhousie ku Halifax, Nova Scotia komanso wapampando wa dipatimenti yachipatala ndi sayansi ya Canadian Diabetes Association anachenjeza kuti kafukufukuyu akadali m'masiku ake oyambirira.

en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ny: Mofanana ndi akatswiri ena, iye amakayikira ngati matenda a shuga angachiritsidwe, ponena kuti zimene apezazi zilibe ntchito kwa anthu amene ali ndi matenda a shuga a Type I.

en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ny: Lolemba, Sara Danius, mlembi wanthawi zonse wa Nobel Committee for Literature ku Sweden Academy, adalengeza poyera pa wailesi ya Sveriges Radio ku Sweden komitiyo, yomwe sinathe kufikira Bob Dylan mwachindunji za kupambana Mphotho ya Nobel mu Literature ya 2016, idasiya. zoyesayesa zake kuti zifike kwa iye.

en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
ny: Danius anati, "Pakali pano sitikuchita kalikonse. Ndayimbira foni ndi kutumiza maimelo kwa wogwira naye ntchito wapamtima ndipo ndalandira mayankho ochezeka. Pakali pano, zimenezo nzokwanira."

en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
ny: M'mbuyomu, CEO wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, adanenanso kuti kampaniyo idayamba pomwe belu lapakhomo silimamveka pashopu yake m'galaja.

en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
ny: Adapanga belu lachitseko cha WiFi, adatero.

en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
ny: Siminoff adati malonda adakula pambuyo pakuwonekera kwake mu 2013 mu gawo la Shark Tank pomwe gulu lawonetsero linakana kupereka ndalama zoyambira.

en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
ny: Chakumapeto kwa chaka cha 2017, Siminoff adawonekera pa kanema wawayilesi wa QVC.

en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
ny: Ring adathetsanso mlandu ndi kampani yachitetezo, ADT Corporation.

en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
ny: Ngakhale katemera mmodzi woyesera akuwoneka kuti angathe kuchepetsa kufa kwa Ebola, mpaka pano, palibe mankhwala omwe awonetsedwa bwino kuti ndi oyenera kuchiza matenda omwe alipo.

en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
ny: Malo ogulitsira amodzi a antibody, ZMapp, poyambirira adawonetsa kulonjeza m'munda, koma kafukufuku wokhazikika adawonetsa kuti inali ndi phindu lochepa kuposa momwe amafunira popewa imfa.

en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
ny: M'mayesero a PALM, ZMapp idakhala ngati chiwongolero, kutanthauza kuti asayansi adagwiritsa ntchito ngati maziko ndikufanizira njira zina zitatu zochiritsira.

en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ny: USA Gymnastics imathandizira kalata ya Komiti ya Olimpiki ya ku United States ndipo imavomereza kufunikira kotheratu kwa banja la Olympic kulimbikitsa malo otetezeka kwa othamanga athu onse.

en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
ny: Timavomereza mawu a USOC kuti zokonda za othamanga athu ndi makalabu, ndi masewera awo, zitha kutumikiridwa bwino popita patsogolo ndi kusintha kofunikira mkati mwa bungwe lathu, m'malo mochita certification.

en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
ny: USA Gymnastics imathandizira kufufuza kodziyimira pawokha komwe kungawalitse momwe kuzunzidwa kwa gawo lomwe lafotokozedwa molimba mtima ndi opulumuka a Larry Nassar akanatha kusadziwika kwa nthawi yayitali ndikulandira kusintha kulikonse koyenera komanso koyenera.

en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ny: USA Gymnastics ndi USOC ali ndi cholinga chomwecho - kupanga masewera a masewera olimbitsa thupi, ndi ena, kukhala otetezeka momwe angathere kuti othamanga atsatire maloto awo pamalo otetezeka, abwino komanso amphamvu.

en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ny: M’zaka zonse za m’ma 1960, Brzezinski anagwira ntchito kwa John F. Kennedy monga mlangizi wake ndipo kenako utsogoleri wa Lyndon B. Johnson.

en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ny: Pa zisankho za 1976 adalangiza Carter za mfundo zakunja, kenako adakhala ngati National Security Advisor (NSA) kuyambira 1977 mpaka 1981, ndikulowa m'malo mwa Henry Kissinger.

en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ny: Monga NSA, adathandizira Carter posamalira nkhani zapadziko lonse lapansi, monga Camp David Accords, 1978; kupangitsa ubale wa US-China kukhala wabwinobwino kumapeto kwa zaka za m'ma 1970; Revolution ya Irani, yomwe idatsogolera ku vuto laukapolo ku Iran, 1979; ndi kuwukira kwa Soviet ku Afghanistan, 1979.

en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ny: Kanemayo, wokhala ndi Ryan Gosling ndi Emma Stone, adasankhidwa m'magulu onse akuluakulu.

en: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ny: Gosling ndi Stone adasankhidwa kukhala Best Actor ndi Actress motsatana.

en: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ny: Ena omwe adasankhidwa akuphatikiza Chithunzi Chabwino Kwambiri, Wotsogolera, Cinematography, Kapangidwe ka Zovala, Kusintha Kwakanema, Score Choyambirira, Mapangidwe Opanga, Kusintha Kwa Phokoso, Kusanganikirana kwa Phokoso ndi Sewero Loyamba.

en: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ny: Nyimbo ziwiri zochokera mu kanemayo, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ndi City of Stars, zidasankhidwa kukhala nyimbo yabwino kwambiri yoyambirira. Situdiyo ya Lionsgate idalandira mayina 26 - kuposa studio ina iliyonse.

en: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
ny: Chakumapeto Lamlungu, Purezidenti wa United States a Donald Trump, m'mawu omwe adaperekedwa kudzera kwa mlembi wa atolankhani, adalengeza kuti asitikali aku US achoka ku Syria.

en: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ny: Izi zidanenedwa pambuyo poti a Trump adalankhula pafoni ndi Purezidenti wa Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

en: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
ny: Dziko la Turkey lidzayang'aniranso asilikali ogwidwa a ISIS omwe, akuti mayiko a ku Ulaya akana kubwerera kwawo.

en: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ny: Izi sizimangotsimikizira kuti ma dinosaur ena anali ndi nthenga, chiphunzitso chofala kale, koma chimapereka tsatanetsatane wa zokwiriridwa zakale zomwe sizingatheke, monga mtundu ndi makonzedwe a mbali zitatu.

en: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
ny: . Asayansi amati nthenga za nyamayi zinali zofiirira pamwamba ndi zotumbululuka kapena zamtundu wa carotenoid.

en: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ny: Zomwe anapezazi zimatithandizanso kudziwa mmene nthenga za mbalame zimasinthira.

en: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ny: Chifukwa nthenga za dinosaur zilibe shaft yopangidwa bwino, yotchedwa rachis, koma imakhala ndi nthenga zina - barbs ndi barbules - ofufuzawo adaganiza kuti rachis mwina ndi chitukuko chamtsogolo chomwe zinthu zina izi.

en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Kapangidwe ka nthengazo kakusonyeza kuti sanali kugwiritsidwa ntchito pouluka, koma pofuna kuwongolera kutentha kapena kuwonetsera. Ofufuzawo ananena kuti, ngakhale uwu ndi mchira wa dinosaur wachichepere, chitsanzocho chimasonyeza nthenga za akulu osati pansi pa mwana wankhuku.

en: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Ofufuzawo ananena kuti, ngakhale uwu ndi mchira wa dinosaur wachichepere, chitsanzocho chimasonyeza nthenga za akulu osati pansi pa mwana wankhuku.

en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
ny: Bomba lomwe laphulitsidwa m'galimoto ku likulu la apolisi ku Gaziantep, Turkey lapha apolisi awiri ndikuvulaza anthu ena opitilira makumi awiri.

en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
ny: Ofesi ya bwanamkubwayo yati 19 mwa anthu ovulalawo ndi apolisi.

en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
ny: Apolisi ati akukayikira kuti gulu la zigawenga la Daesh (ISIL) ndi lomwe lachita chiwembuchi.

en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
ny: Anapeza kuti Dzuwa limagwira ntchito mofanana ndi nyenyezi zina: Zochita za nyenyezi zonse m’dongosolo la zinthuzo zinapezeka kuti zimayendetsedwa ndi kuwala kwawo, kuzungulira kwawo, ndiponso palibe china chilichonse.

en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
ny: Kuwala ndi kuzungulira kumagwiritsidwa ntchito limodzi kudziwa nambala ya Rossby ya nyenyezi, yomwe imagwirizana ndi kutuluka kwa plasma.

en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
ny: Nambala yaying'ono ya Rossby, nyenyezi imachepa kwambiri potengera kusintha kwa maginito.

en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
ny: Paulendo wake, Iwasaki anakumana ndi mavuto nthawi zambiri.

en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ny: Anabedwa ndi achifwamba, anaukiridwa ku Tibet ndi galu wachiwewe, anathawa ukwati ku Nepal ndipo anamangidwa ku India.

en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ny: Muyezo wa 802.11n umagwira ntchito pama frequency a 2.4Ghz ndi 5.0Ghz.

en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
ny: Izi zipangitsa kuti ikhale yakumbuyo yogwirizana ndi 802.11a, 802.11b ndi 802.11g, bola ngati malo oyambira ali ndi ma wayilesi apawiri.

en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ny: Mayendedwe a 802.11n ndi othamanga kwambiri kuposa omwe adatsogolera omwe ali ndi mphamvu yopitilira 600Mbit / s.

en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
ny: Duvall, yemwe anakwatiwa ndi ana awiri akuluakulu, sanasiye chidwi chachikulu pa Miller, yemwe nkhaniyi inamukhudza.

en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ny: Atafunsidwa kuti apereke ndemanga, Miller anati, "Mike amalankhula zambiri panthawi ya zokambirana ... ndinali kukonzekera kotero kuti sindinamve zomwe akunena."

en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ny: "Tiyesetsa kuchepetsa kutulutsa mpweya wa carbon dioxide pagawo lililonse la GDP ndi malire odziwika pofika 2020 kuchokera mulingo wa 2005," adatero Hu.

en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
ny: Sanakhazikitse chiwerengero cha kudulako, ponena kuti apangidwa kutengera zomwe China ikuchita pazachuma.

en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
ny: Hu analimbikitsa mayiko omwe akutukuka kumene "kupewa njira yakale yoipitsa kaye ndi kuyeretsa pambuyo pake."

en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
ny: Ananenanso kuti "komabe sayenera kufunsidwa kuti azigwira ntchito zomwe zimapitilira gawo lawo lachitukuko, udindo ndi kuthekera kwawo."

en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
ny: Gulu Lophunzira la Iraq lapereka lipoti lake ku 12.00 GMT lero.

en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
ny: Ikuchenjeza Palibe amene angatsimikize kuti zomwe zikuchitika ku Iraq pakadali pano zidzathetsa nkhondo zamagulu, ziwawa zomwe zikukulirakulira, kapena chisokonezo.

en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
ny: Lipotilo limayamba ndi pempho la mkangano wotseguka komanso kukhazikitsidwa kwa mgwirizano ku United States pankhani ya mfundo zaku Middle East.

en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
ny: Lipotili likutsutsa kwambiri pafupifupi mbali zonse za ndondomeko yamakono ya Executive ku Iraq ndipo ikulimbikitsa kusintha kwanthawi yomweyo.

en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ny: Choyamba mwa malingaliro ake 78 ndikuti njira yatsopano yaukazembe iyenera kuchitika kumapeto kwa chaka chino kuti ateteze malire a Iraq kuti asalowererepo komanso kukhazikitsanso ubale waukazembe ndi anansi ake.

en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ny: Senator wapano komanso Mkazi Woyamba waku Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner adalengeza dzulo madzulo ku La Plata, mzinda womwe uli pamtunda wa makilomita 50 kuchokera ku Buenos Aires.

en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ny: Akazi a Kirchner adalengeza kuti akufuna kuthamangira pulezidenti ku Argentina Theatre, malo omwewo omwe adayambitsa kampeni yake ya 2005 ku Senate monga membala wa nthumwi za chigawo cha Buenos Aires.

en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ny: Mtsutsowo unayambitsidwa ndi mikangano yogwiritsira ntchito ndalama zothandizira ndi kumanganso mkuntho wa Hurricane Katrina; zomwe ena osunga ndalama adazitcha moseketsa "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
ny: Kutsutsa kwaufulu pa ntchito yomanganso kumayang'ana kwambiri pakupereka mapangano omanganso kwa omwe akuwoneka kuti aku Washington.

en: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ny: Anthu oposa 4 miliyoni anapita ku Roma kukachita nawo malirowo.

en: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ny: Chiwerengero cha anthu omwe analipo chinali chochuluka kwambiri moti sikunali kotheka kuti aliyense athe kupeza mwayi wopita kumaliro ku St.

en: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
ny: Makanema akuluakulu angapo a wailesi yakanema anaikidwa m’malo osiyanasiyana ku Rome kuti anthu azionera mwambowu.

en: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
ny: M'mizinda ina yambiri ya ku Italy komanso padziko lonse lapansi, makamaka ku Poland, machitidwe ofanana adapangidwa, omwe anthu ambiri adawawona.

en: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
ny: Akatswiri a mbiri yakale adadzudzula mfundo zam'mbuyomu za FBI poyang'ana kwambiri zinthu pamilandu yomwe ndi yosavuta kuyithetsa, makamaka milandu yakubedwa yamagalimoto, ndi cholinga chokweza kuti bungweli lichite bwino.

en: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
ny: Congress idayamba kuthandizira ndalama zonyansa mu 2005 ndipo idanenanso kuti FBI iyenera kupereka othandizira 10 ku zolaula za akulu.

en: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ny: Robin Uthappa adapanga ma innings apamwamba kwambiri, ma runs 70 m'mipira 41 yokha pomenya anayi anayi ndi asanu ndi awiri.

en: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
ny: Omenyera nkhondo apakati, Sachin Tendulkar ndi Rahul Dravid, adachita bwino ndikupanga mgwirizano wazaka zana.

en: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
ny: Koma, atataya chigoli cha captain India adangopanga ma runs 36 kutaya mawiketi 7 kuti athetse ma innings.

en: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ny: Purezidenti wa United States George W. Bush anafika ku Singapore m’maŵa wa pa November 16, kuyamba ulendo wa mlungu umodzi wopita ku Asia.

en: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ny: Adalandilidwa ndi Wachiwiri kwa Prime Minister waku Singapore a Wong Kan Seng ndipo adakambirana zamalonda ndi uchigawenga ndi Prime Minister waku Singapore a Lee Hsien Loong.

en: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ny: Pambuyo pa sabata latayika pachisankho chapakati, Bush adauza omvera za kukula kwa malonda ku Asia.

en: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ny: Prime Minister Stephen Harper adavomera kutumiza boma la 'Clean Air Act' ku komiti yamagulu onse kuti awonedwe, asanawerengenso kachiwiri, pambuyo pa msonkhano wa Lachiwiri wa mphindi 25 ndi mtsogoleri wa NDP Jack Layton ku PMO.

en: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
ny: Layton adapempha kuti zisinthidwe pabilu yazachilengedwe ya Conservatives pamsonkhano ndi PM, kupempha "kulembedwanso mokwanira" kwa bilu ya chilengedwe ya chipani cha Conservative.

en: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
ny: Kuyambira pomwe Boma la Federal lidalowererapo kuti litenge ndalama ku chipatala cha Mersey ku Devonport, Tasmania, boma la boma ndi aphungu ena a feduro adadzudzula izi ngati chododometsa pamawu oyamba a chisankho cha federal chomwe chidzayitanidwe pofika Novembala.

en: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
ny: Koma Prime Minister John Howard adati mchitidwewu ndikungoteteza zipatala kuti zisagwetsedwe ndi boma la Tasmania, popereka ndalama zowonjezera za AUD $ 45 miliyoni.

en: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ny: Malinga ndi nkhani yaposachedwa, kuwerengera kwa nyanja kukuwonetsa kuti tsunami idapangidwa. Panali zochitika zenizeni za tsunami zojambulidwa pafupi ndi Pago Pago ndi Niue.

en: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
ny: Palibe kuwonongeka kwakukulu kapena kuvulala komwe kwachitika ku Tonga, koma mphamvu idatayika kwakanthawi, zomwe akuti zidalepheretsa akuluakulu a boma la Tonga kulandira chenjezo la tsunami loperekedwa ndi PTWC.

en: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
ny: Masukulu khumi ndi anayi ku Hawaii omwe ali m'mphepete mwa nyanja kapena pafupi ndi nyanja adatsekedwa Lachitatu lonse ngakhale machenjezo adachotsedwa.

en: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ny: Purezidenti wa United States George W. Bush anasangalala ndi chilengezochi.

en: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ny: Mneneri wa Bush a Gordon Johndroe adati lonjezo la North Korea "ndi sitepe yayikulu yokwaniritsa cholinga chofuna kutsimikizika kuti chiwonongeko cha nyukiliya cha Korea chichitike."

en: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ny: Mphepo yamkuntho ya khumi yotchedwa Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, yomwe idapangidwa panyanja ya Atlantic lero.

en: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
ny: National Hurricane Center (NHC) ikunena kuti pakadali pano Jerry sakuwopseza malo.

en: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
ny: Bungwe la US Corps of Engineers linanena kuti mvula yokwana mainchesi 6 ikhoza kusokoneza mafunde omwe anawonongeka kale.

en: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
ny: Ward yachisanu ndi chinayi, yomwe inawona kusefukira kwa madzi pamtunda wa mamita 20 panthawi ya mphepo yamkuntho Katrina, pakali pano ili m'madzi okwera m'chiuno pamene levee yapafupi inadutsa.

en: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
ny: Madzi akutsanulira pamwamba pa levee mu gawo la mamita 100 m'lifupi.

en: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ny: Woyang'anira Commons Adam Cuerden adawonetsa kukhumudwa kwake pakuchotsedwako pomwe adalankhula ndi Wikipedia mwezi watha.

en: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
ny: "Iye [Wales] kwenikweni anatinamiza kuyambira pachiyambi. Choyamba, pochita ngati kuti izi zinali pazifukwa zalamulo. Chachiŵiri, ponamizira kuti akumvetsera kwa ife, mpaka kuchotsedwa kwa luso lake."

en: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
ny: Kukwiyitsidwa ndi anthu amderali kudapangitsa kuti pakhale zoyesayesa zaposachedwa zopanga mfundo zokhuza zogonana zamasamba omwe amakhala ndi mamiliyoni azama TV omwe ali ndi zilolezo.

en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ny: Ntchito yomwe idachitika nthawi zambiri inali yongopeka, koma pulogalamuyo idalembedwa kuti ifanane ndi zomwe zidachitika mlalang'amba wa Sagittarius.

en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ny: Zomwe gululi linkafuna likhoza kuchitika chifukwa cha mphamvu ya mafunde pakati pa zinthu zakuda za mlalang'ambawu ndi mdima wa Milky Way.

en: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ny: Monga momwe mwezi umakokera padziko lapansi, kuchititsa mafunde, momwemonso Mlalang’amba wa Milky Way umachita mphamvu pa mlalang’amba wa Sagittarius.

en: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
ny: Asayansi adatha kunena kuti chinthu chamdima chimakhudzanso zinthu zina zakuda monga momwe zimachitira nthawi zonse.

en: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
ny: Chiphunzitsochi chimanena kuti zinthu zakuda zambiri zozungulira mlalang'amba zimakhala mozungulira mlalang'amba mumtundu wa halo, ndipo zimapangidwa ndi tinthu tating'ono tambirimbiri.

en: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
ny: Malipoti apawailesi yakanema akuwonetsa utsi woyera ukuchokera ku fakitale.

en: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
ny: Akuluakulu a m’derali akuchenjeza anthu okhala pafupi ndi nyumbayo kuti asamalowe m’nyumba, azimitsa makina oziziritsira mpweya komanso kuti asamwe madzi apampopi.

en: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
ny: Malinga ndi bungwe la nyukiliya la ku Japan, pafakitale yatulukira cesium ndi ayodini wa radioactive.

en: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
ny: Akuluakulu akuganiza kuti izi zikusonyeza kuti makontena omwe amakhala ndi mafuta a uranium pamalowa mwina adaphulika ndipo akutuluka.

en: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
ny: Dr. Tony Moll adapeza Chifuwa Cholimbana ndi Mankhwala Kwambiri (XDR-TB) m'chigawo cha South Africa KwaZulu-Natal.

en: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
ny: Poyankhulana, adanena kuti kusinthaku kunali "kovuta kwambiri komanso kochititsa mantha chifukwa cha chiwerengero cha anthu omwe amafa."

en: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
ny: Odwala ena ayenera kuti adadwala matendawa m'chipatala, Dr. Moll akuganiza, ndipo osachepera awiri anali ogwira ntchito zachipatala.

en: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
ny: Pakatha chaka chimodzi, munthu amene ali ndi kachilomboka akhoza kupatsira anthu 10 mpaka 15 omwe ali pafupi kwambiri.

en: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
ny: Komabe, chiwerengero cha XDR-TB pagulu lonse la anthu omwe ali ndi chifuwa chachikulu chikuwonekabe chochepa; 6,000 mwa anthu 330,000 omwe ali ndi kachilombo nthawi ina iliyonse ku South Africa.

en: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
ny: Masetilaiti, onse omwe ankalemera mapaundi 1,000, ndipo akuyenda pafupifupi makilomita 17,500 pa ola, anagundana makilomita 491 pamwamba pa Dziko Lapansi.

en: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
ny: Asayansi akuti kuphulika komwe kunayambitsa ngoziyi kunali kwakukulu.

en: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
ny: Iwo akuyesetsabe kudziwa kuti ngoziyi inali yaikulu bwanji komanso mmene dziko lidzakhudzire.

en: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
ny: United States Strategic Command of the US Department of Defense office ikutsatira zinyalalazo.

en: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
ny: Zotsatira za kusanthula chiwembu zidzatumizidwa ku webusaiti ya anthu.

en: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
ny: Dotolo yemwe amagwira ntchito pachipatala cha Ana ku Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania ati ayimbidwa mlandu wopha mayi ake atapezeka atafa m'galimoto yake Lachitatu, akuluakulu aku Ohio atero.

en: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
ny: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, wazaka 29, adapezeka ku Blue Ash, Ohio, dera lomwe lili pamtunda wa makilomita pafupifupi 15 kumpoto kwa Cincinnati atagona pansi m'mphepete mwa msewu atavala T-sheti ndi zovala zamkati m'malo omwe akuwoneka kuti anali ndi mankhwala kwambiri.

en: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
ny: Adawalozera apolisi ku Oldsmobile Intrigue yake yakuda yomwe inali pamtunda wa 500.

en: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
ny: Kumeneko, adapeza mtembo wa Saroja Balasubramanian, wazaka 53, utakutidwa ndi mabulangete opaka magazi.

en: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ny: Apolisi ati thupilo likuwoneka kuti lakhalako kwa tsiku limodzi.

en: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
ny: Milandu yoyamba ya matendawa nyengoyi idanenedwa kumapeto kwa Julayi.

en: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
ny: Matendawa amatengedwa ndi nkhumba, zomwe zimasamukira kwa anthu kudzera mu udzudzu.

en: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ny: Mliriwu wapangitsa kuti boma la India lichitepo kanthu monga kutumiza opha nkhumba kumadera omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri, kugawa makatani masauzande a udzudzu komanso kupopera mankhwala ophera tizilombo.

en: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
ny: Mamiliyoni angapo a katemera wa encephalitis adalonjezedwanso ndi boma, zomwe zingathandize kukonzekera mabungwe azaumoyo chaka chamawa.

en: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
ny: Mapulani oti katemera aperekedwe kumadera omwe adakhudzidwa kwambiri chaka chino adachedwa chifukwa cha kusowa kwandalama komanso kuyika patsogolo pang'ono poyerekeza ndi matenda ena.

en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
ny: Mu 1956 Słania anasamukira ku Sweden, kumene zaka zitatu pambuyo pake anayamba kugwira ntchito ku Post Office ya ku Sweden ndipo anakhala katswiri wojambula zithunzi.

en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
ny: Anapanga masitampu opitilira 1,000 a Sweden ndi mayiko ena 28.

en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
ny: Ntchito yake ndi yodziwika bwino komanso mwatsatanetsatane kotero kuti ndi m'modzi mwa "mayina apanyumba" ochepa pakati pa ochita zamatsenga. Ena amakhazikika pakusonkhanitsa ntchito yake yekha.

en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
ny: Sitampu yake ya 1,000 inali "Zochita Zazikulu Za Mafumu a Sweden" yolembedwa ndi David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mu 2000, yomwe yalembedwa mu Guinness Book of World Records.

en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ny: Ankachitanso zojambulajambula zamayiko ambiri, zitsanzo zaposachedwa za ntchito yake kuphatikiza zithunzi za Prime Minister kutsogolo kwa $5 ndi $100 yaku Canada.

en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
ny: Ngoziyo itachitika, Gibson adatengedwa kupita kuchipatala koma adamwalira posakhalitsa.

en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
ny: Dalaivala wa galimotoyo, wazaka 64, sanavulale pangoziyi.

en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
ny: Galimotoyo idachotsedwa pamalo pomwe ngoziyo idachitika pafupifupi 1200 GMT tsiku lomwelo.

en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
ny: Munthu wina wogwira ntchito m’galaja pafupi ndi kumene ngoziyo inachitikira anati: “Panali ana amene ankayembekezera kuwoloka msewu ndipo onse anali kukuwa ndi kulira.

en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
ny: Onse anathamanga kubwerera kumene ngoziyo inachitikira.

en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
ny: Nkhani zina zomwe zakonzedwa ku Bali zikuphatikiza kupulumutsa nkhalango zomwe zatsala padziko lapansi, ndikugawana umisiri wothandiza mayiko omwe akutukuka kumene kukula m'njira zosaipitsa.

en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
ny: UN ikuyembekezanso kumaliza thumba lothandizira mayiko omwe akhudzidwa ndi kutentha kwa dziko kuti athe kuthana ndi zovutazi.

en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
ny: Ndalamazo zikhoza kupita ku nyumba zosawononga madzi, kusamalira bwino madzi, ndi kubzala mbewu zosiyanasiyana.

en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
ny: Fluke analemba kuti zoyesayesa za ena zolepheretsa amayi kulankhula za thanzi la amayi sizinaphule kanthu.

en: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
ny: Anafika pamfundoyi chifukwa cha ndemanga zambiri zabwino ndi chilimbikitso chomwe amuna ndi akazi omwe amatumizidwa kwa iye zolimbikitsa kuti mankhwala olerera azionedwa ngati chofunikira kuchipatala.

en: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
ny: Nkhondoyo itasiya ovulalawo atawatengera kuchipatala, pafupifupi akaidi ena 40 otsalawo anatsalira pabwalo ndipo anakana kubwerera m’zipinda zawo.

en: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
ny: Okambirana adayesetsa kukonza vutoli, koma zofuna za akaidi sizikudziwika.

en: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
ny: Pakati pa 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, moto unayambika ndi akaidi pabwalo.

en: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
ny: Posakhalitsa, apolisi omwe anali ndi zida zachiwawa adalowa pabwalo ndikutsekera akaidiwo ndi utsi wokhetsa misozi.

en: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
ny: Opulumutsa ozimitsa moto adazimitsa motowo pofika 11:35 pm.

en: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
ny: Damulo litamangidwa mu 1963, kusefukira kwa madzi komwe kumafalikira mumtsinje wonsewo kunayimitsidwa.

en: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
ny: Dothi limeneli linali lofunika popanga mchenga ndi magombe, omwe anali malo okhala nyama zakuthengo.

en: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
ny: Chifukwa cha zimenezi, mitundu iwiri ya nsomba yatha, ndipo ina iŵiri yatsala pang’ono kutha, kuphatikizapo mtundu wa humpback chub.

en: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
ny: Ngakhale kuti madziwo adzakwera mamita ochepa pambuyo pa kusefukira kwa madzi, akuluakulu a boma akuyembekeza kuti adzakhala okwanira kubwezeretsa mchenga womwe unakokoloka kunsi kwa mtsinjewo.

en: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
ny: Palibe chenjezo la tsunami lomwe laperekedwa, ndipo malinga ndi bungwe la Jakarta geophysics, palibe chenjezo la tsunami lomwe lidzaperekedwe chifukwa chivomezicho sichinakwaniritse zofunikira za 6.5.

en: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
ny: Ngakhale kuti panalibe chiwopsezo cha tsunami, anthu anayamba kuchita mantha ndipo anayamba kusiya mabizinesi awo ndi nyumba zawo.

en: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
ny: Ngakhale Winfrey anali ndi misozi potsanzikana, adawafotokozera momveka bwino kuti abweranso.

en: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
ny: "Izi sizikhala bwino. Uku ndikutseka kwa mutu umodzi ndikutsegula kwatsopano."

en: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
ny: Zotsatira zomaliza za chisankho cha pulezidenti wa dziko la Namibia ndi aphungu a dziko la Namibia zasonyeza kuti pulezidenti yemwe ali pampando, Hifikepunye Pohamba, wasankhidwanso ndi mavoti ambiri.

en: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
ny: Chipani cholamula cha South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO) chidasunganso anthu ambiri pazisankho zanyumba yamalamulo.

en: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
ny: Asitikali a Coalition ndi Afghan adasamukira kuderali kuti ateteze malowa ndipo ndege zina zamgwirizano zatumizidwa kuti zikathandizire.

en: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
ny: Ngoziyi inachitika pamwamba pa mapiri, ndipo akukhulupirira kuti idachitika chifukwa cha moto wankhanza.

en: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
ny: Zoyesayesa zofufuza malo a ngozizi zikukwaniritsidwa chifukwa cha nyengo yoipa komanso madera ovuta.

en: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
ny: Mabungwe othandizira azachipatala ku Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres ndi World Health Organisation ati ndi mliri woyipa kwambiri womwe wachitika mdziko muno.

en: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
ny: Mneneri wa bungwe la Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman adati: "Angola ikupita ku chipwirikiti choipitsitsa kuposa kale lonse ndipo zinthu zikadali zoipa kwambiri ku Angola," adatero.

en: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
ny: Masewerawa adayamba nthawi ya 10:00am pomwe nyengo ili bwino komanso kunja kwa mvula yam'mawa yomwe idayera mwachangu, linali tsiku labwino kwambiri pamasewera a rugby a 7.

en: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
ny: Mbewu zotsogola pampikisano South Africa idayamba bwino pomwe idapambana bwino 26 - 00 motsutsana ndi Zambia yomwe yatuluka 5.

en: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
ny: Poyang'ana dzimbiri pamasewera olimbana ndi azilongo awo akumwera, South Africa idachita bwino pomwe mpikisano ukupita patsogolo.

en: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ny: Kuteteza kwawo mwanzeru, luso loyendetsa mpira komanso ntchito yabwino yatimu zidawapangitsa kukhala odziwika bwino ndipo zidawonekeratu kuti iyi ndi timu yomwe iyenera kugonja.

en: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
ny: Akuluakulu a mzinda wa Amsterdam ndi nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale ya Anne Frank anena kuti mtengowo uli ndi matenda a mafangasi ndipo umabweretsa chiwopsezo paumoyo wa anthu chifukwa akutsutsa kuti udatsala pang'ono kugwa.

en: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
ny: Idayenera kudulidwa Lachiwiri, koma idapulumutsidwa pambuyo pa chigamulo cha khothi ladzidzidzi.

en: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
ny: Mipata yonse ya mphanga, yomwe idatchedwa "Alongo Asanu ndi Awiri", ndi osachepera 100 mpaka 250 mita (328 mpaka 820 mapazi) m'mimba mwake.

en: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
ny: Zithunzi za infrared zikuwonetsa kuti kutentha kwausiku ndi usana kumawonetsa kuti mwina ndi mapanga.

en: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
ny: "Zimakhala zozizira kwambiri kuposa malo ozungulira masana ndipo zimatentha usiku.

en: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ny: Kutentha kwawo sikuli kokhazikika ngati mapanga akuluakulu padziko lapansi omwe nthawi zambiri amasunga kutentha kosasintha, koma amagwirizana ndi kukhala maenje akuya pansi, "anatero Glen Cushing wa United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team ndi. Northern Arizona University ili ku Flagstaff, Arizona.

en: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
ny: Ku France, kuvota kwakhala kovutirapo kwambiri: ovota amadzipatula m'chipinda chochezera, ndikuyika pepala losindikizidwa kale lomwe likuwonetsa munthu yemwe angasankhe mu envelopu.

en: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
ny: Akuluakulu akatsimikizira kuti wovotayo ndi ndani, wovotayo amaponya envelopuyo m'bokosi loponya voti ndikusaina mpukutu wovota.

en: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
ny: Lamulo lachisankho la ku France limakhazikitsa zomwe zikuchitika.

en: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
ny: Kuyambira m’chaka cha 1988, mabokosi oponya voti ayenera kukhala omveka bwino kuti ovota ndi owonerera azichitira umboni kuti palibe maenvulopu omwe amapezeka poyambira voti ndiponso kuti palibe maenvulopu amene amawonjezeredwa kusiyapo okhawo amene anawerengedwa moyenerera ndi ovomerezeka.

en: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
ny: Otsatira akhoza kutumiza nthumwi kuti azichitira umboni gawo lililonse la ndondomekoyi. Madzulo, mavoti amawerengedwa ndi anthu odzipereka pansi pa kuyang'aniridwa kwakukulu, motsatira ndondomeko yeniyeni.

en: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
ny: ASUS Eee PC, yomwe idakhazikitsidwa m'mbuyomu padziko lonse lapansi kuti ipulumutse ndalama komanso magwiridwe antchito, idakhala mutu wovuta kwambiri mu 2007 Mwezi wa Taipei IT.

en: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ny: Koma msika wa ogula pamakompyuta a laputopu ukhala wosiyanasiyana ndikusintha ASUS itaperekedwa mu 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award ndi Executive Yuan waku Republic of China.

en: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
ny: Webusaiti ya siteshoniyi ikufotokoza za masewerowa ngati "bwalo lamasewero lakale la pawailesi lokhala ndi masewera atsopano komanso ochititsa manyazi!"

en: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
ny: M'masiku ake oyambilira, chiwonetserochi chidawonetsedwa pawailesi yapaintaneti ya TogiNet Radio, tsamba lomwe limayang'ana kwambiri wailesi yakanema.

en: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
ny: Chakumapeto kwa 2015, TogiNet idakhazikitsa AstroNet Radio ngati malo othandizira.

en: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
ny: Kanemayu poyamba anali ndi zisudzo zamateur, komweko ku East Texas.

en: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
ny: Akuti kuba zinthu zambiri kunapitirira usiku wonse, popeza apolisi kunalibe m’misewu ya ku Bishkek.

en: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
ny: Munthu wina ananena kuti Bishkek anamira mumkhalidwe wa “chipwirikiti” pamene magulu achifwamba ankayendayenda m’misewu ndi kulanda zinthu m’masitolo.

en: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
ny: Anthu angapo a ku Bishkek anaimba mlandu anthu ochita zionetsero ochokera kumwera kwa dzikolo chifukwa cha kusamvera malamulo.

en: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
ny: South Africa yagonjetsa All Blacks (New Zealand) pamasewera a rugby union Tri Nations pa Royal Bafokeng Stadium ku Rustenburg, South Africa.

en: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
ny: Chigoli chomaliza chinali chigonjetso cha mfundo imodzi, 21 mpaka 20, zomwe zidathetsa mpikisano wopambana wamasewera 15 a All Blacks.

en: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
ny: Kwa ma Springboks, idathetsa kuluza kwamasewera asanu.

en: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
ny: Unali masewero omaliza a All Blacks omwe anali atatenga kale chikhochi masabata awiri apitawa.

en: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
ny: Masewero omaliza amasewerawa achitika ku Ellis Park ku Johannesburg sabata yamawa, pomwe ma Springboks adzasewera ndi Australia.

en: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
ny: Chivomezi chaching'ono chinagwedeza kumadzulo kwa Montana nthawi ya 10:08 pm Lolemba.

en: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
ny: Palibe malipoti okhudza kuwonongeka omwe alandiridwa ndi United States Geological Survey (USGS) ndi National Earthquake Information Center.

en: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ny: Chivomezicho chinali pamtunda wa makilomita pafupifupi 20 kumpoto chakum’mawa kwa Dillon, komanso makilomita pafupifupi 65 kum’mwera kwa Butte.

en: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
ny: Matenda a chimfine cha mbalame omwe amapha anthu, H5N1, atsimikiziridwa kuti adapatsira bakha wakuthengo wakufa, yemwe adapezeka Lolemba, m'madambo pafupi ndi Lyon kum'mawa kwa France.

en: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
ny: France ndi dziko lachisanu ndi chiwiri mu European Union kudwala kachilomboka; kutsatira Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece ndi Italy.

en: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
ny: Milandu yomwe ikuganiziridwa kuti ya H5N1 ku Croatia ndi Denmark sinatsimikizidwe.

en: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
ny: Chambers adasumira Mulungu chifukwa cha "imfa yofalikira, chiwonongeko ndi zoopsa za mamiliyoni ndi mamiliyoni a okhala padziko lapansi."

en: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
ny: Chambers, wokhulupirira kuti kuli Mulungu, akunena kuti mlandu wake ndi "wopanda pake" ndipo "aliyense akhoza kuimba mlandu aliyense."

en: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
ny: Nkhani yoperekedwa mu opera ya ku France, ndi Camille Saint-Saens, ndi ya wojambula "yemwe moyo wake umatsimikiziridwa ndi kukonda mankhwala osokoneza bongo ndi Japan."

en: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
ny: Zotsatira zake, ochita masewerawa amasuta fodya wa chamba pa siteji, ndipo bwalo lamasewera lomwe limalimbikitsa omvera kuti alowe nawo.

en: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
ny: Mneneri wakale wa Nyumbayi Newt Gingrich, bwanamkubwa waku Texas Rick Perry, ndi Congresswoman Michele Bachmann adamaliza malo achinayi, achisanu, ndi achisanu ndi chimodzi motsatana.

en: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
ny: Zotsatira zitabwera, Gingrich adayamika Santorum, koma anali ndi mawu ovuta kwa Romney, yemwe m'malo mwake zotsatsa zotsatsa zotsatsa zidawulutsidwa ku Iowa motsutsana ndi Gingrich.

en: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
ny: Perry adati "abwereranso ku Texas kuti akawone zotsatira za msonkhano wamasiku ano, kuti awone ngati pali njira yanga yopititsira patsogolo mpikisanowu", koma pambuyo pake adati apitilizabe mpikisano ndikupikisana nawo mu Januware 21 South Carolina. .

en: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ny: Bachmann, yemwe adapambana pa Ames Straw Poll mu Ogasiti, adaganiza zothetsa kampeni yake.

en: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
ny: Wojambulayo adatumizidwa ku Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, komwe adamwalira.

en: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ny: Ananenedwa kuti anali ndi zaka za m'ma 20. M'mawu ake, Bieber adati "[pomwe] sindinalipo kapena kukhudzidwa mwachindunji ndi ngozi yowopsayi, malingaliro anga ndi mapemphero anga ali ndi banja la wovulalayo."

en: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
ny: Webusayiti yosangalatsa ya TMZ ikumvetsetsa kuti wojambulayo adayimitsa galimoto yake kutsidya lina la Sepulveda Boulevard ndikuyesa kujambula zithunzi za apolisi asanawoloke msewu ndikupitiliza, zomwe zidapangitsa wapolisi waku California Highway Patrol kuyimitsa magalimoto kuti amuwuze kuti abwerere, kawiri.

en: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
ny: Malingana ndi apolisi, dalaivala wa galimoto yomwe inagunda wojambulayo sangakumane ndi mlandu.

en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
ny: Pokhala ndi mendulo khumi ndi zisanu ndi zitatu zokha patsiku, mayiko angapo alephera kupanga mamendulo.

en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
ny: Akuphatikizapo Netherlands, ndi Anna Jochemsen kumaliza wachisanu ndi chinayi m'kalasi ya amayi mu Super-G dzulo, ndi Finland ndi Katja Saarinen kumaliza khumi pazochitika zomwezo.

en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Mitchell Gourley waku Australia adamaliza nambala 11 mu Super-G ya amuna. Mpikisano waku Czech Oldrich Jelinek adamaliza wakhumi ndi chisanu ndi chimodzi pamisonkhano ya amuna Super-G.

en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
ny: Arly Velasquez waku Mexico adamaliza wakhumi ndi chisanu pamisonkhano ya amuna Super-G. Adam Hall waku New Zealand adamaliza wachisanu ndi chinayi mu Super-G ya amuna.

en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Osewera otsetsereka otsetsereka a amuna aku Poland Maciej Krezel komanso wowongolera Anna Ogarzynska adamaliza nambala 13 mu Super-G. Jong Seork Park waku South Korea adamaliza makumi awiri ndi anayi pakukhala amuna Super-G.

en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
ny: Oyang'anira mtendere a UN, omwe adafika ku Haiti pambuyo pa chivomezi cha 2010, akuimbidwa mlandu wofalitsa matenda omwe adayamba pafupi ndi msasa wa asilikali.

en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
ny: Malinga ndi mlanduwu, zinyalala zochokera kumsasa wa UN sizinayeretsedwe bwino, zomwe zimapangitsa kuti mabakiteriya alowe mumtsinje wa Artibonite, womwe ndi umodzi mwa mtsinje waukulu kwambiri ku Haiti.

en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
ny: Asilikali asanafike, dziko la Haiti silinakumanepo ndi mavuto okhudzana ndi matendawa kuyambira m'ma 1800.

en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
ny: Bungwe la Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy latchulapo kafukufuku wodziyimira pawokha omwe akuwonetsa kuti gulu lankhondo la UN la Nepalese labweretsa matendawa ku Haiti mosadziwa.

en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ny: Katswiri wa UN pa matendawa, a Danielle Lantagne, adati mliriwu udachitika chifukwa cha oteteza mtendere.

en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
ny: Hamilton adatsimikizira chipatala cha Howard University kuti adavomereza kuti wodwalayo ali bwino.

en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
ny: Wodwalayo anali ku Nigeria, komwe kunachitika matenda ena a Ebola.

en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
ny: Chipatalacho chatsatira ndondomeko yoletsa matenda, kuphatikizapo kulekanitsa wodwalayo kwa ena pofuna kupewa kutenga matenda ena.

en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
ny: The Simpsons Simon asanagwire ntchito paziwonetsero zingapo m'malo osiyanasiyana.

en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
ny: M'zaka za m'ma 1980 adagwira ntchito paziwonetsero monga Taxi, Cheers, ndi The Tracy Ullman Show.

en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
ny: Mu 1989 adathandizira kupanga The Simpsons ndi Brooks ndi Groening, ndipo anali ndi udindo wolembera gulu loyamba lolemba.

en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
ny: Ngakhale adasiya chiwonetserochi mu 1993 adasunga dzina la wopanga wamkulu, ndipo adapitilizabe kulandira madola mamiliyoni ambiri pachaka chilichonse.

en: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
ny: M'mbuyomu bungwe lofalitsa nkhani ku China Xinhua linanena kuti ndege inabedwa.

en: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
ny: Pambuyo pake malipoti adawonetsa kuti ndegeyo idawopsezedwa ndi bomba ndipo idabwezedwa ku Afghanistan, ndikutera ku Kandahar.

en: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ny: Malipoti oyambilira akuti ndegeyo idatembenuzidwa kubwerera ku Afghanistan atakanidwa kuti ifike mwadzidzidzi ku Ürümqi.

en: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
ny: Ngozi zapamlengalenga ndizofala ku Iran, yomwe ili ndi zombo zokalamba zomwe sizisamalidwa bwino pantchito zapagulu komanso zankhondo.

en: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
ny: Zilango zapadziko lonse lapansi zatanthauza kuti ndege zatsopano sizingagulidwe.

en: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
ny: Kumayambiriro kwa sabata ino, ngozi ya helikoputala ya apolisi idapha anthu atatu ndikuvulaza ena atatu.

en: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
ny: Mwezi watha dziko la Iran lidawona tsoka lalikulu kwambiri la ndege pazaka pomwe ndege yopita ku Armenia idagwa, kupha anthu 168 omwe adakwera.

en: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
ny: Mwezi womwewo adawona ndege ina ikudutsa mumsewu ku Mashhad ndikugunda khoma, kupha khumi ndi zisanu ndi ziwiri.

en: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
ny: Aerosmith aletsa ma concert awo otsala paulendo wawo.

en: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
ny: Gulu la rock lidayenera kuyendera United States ndi Canada mpaka Seputembara 16.

en: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
ny: Asiya ulendowu pambuyo poti woyimba wamkulu Steven Tyler adavulala atagwa pa siteji pomwe akuchita pa Ogasiti 5.

en: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
ny: Murray adataya seti yoyamba panthawi yopuma amuna onse awiri atagwirana nawo gawo lililonse.

en: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
ny: Del Potro anali ndi mwayi woyambirira mu seti yachiwiri, koma izi zidafunikiranso kupuma atakwanitsa 6-6.

en: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
ny: Potro adalandira chithandizo paphewa pake panthawiyi koma adakwanitsa kubwereranso kumasewera.

en: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
ny: Pulogalamuyi idayamba nthawi ya 8:30 pm nthawi yakomweko (15.00 UTC).

en: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
ny: Oimba otchuka m'dziko lonselo anapereka bhajans, kapena nyimbo zopembedza, kumapazi a Shri Shyam.

en: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ny: Woyimba Sanju Sharma adayamba madzulo, ndikutsatiridwa ndi Jai Shankar Choudhary. adatumizanso chhappan bhog bhajan. Woyimba, Raju Khandelwal anali kutsagana naye.

en: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
ny: Kenako, Lakkha Singh adatsogolera pakuyimba bhajans.

en: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
ny: 108 mbale za Chhappan Bhog (mu Chihindu, 56 zinthu zodyedwa zosiyanasiyana, monga, maswiti, zipatso, mtedza, mbale ndi zina zomwe zimaperekedwa kwa mulungu) zinaperekedwa kwa Baba Shyam.

en: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ny: Lakkha Singh adaperekanso chhappan bhog bhajan. Woyimba, Raju Khandelwal anali kutsagana naye.

en: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
ny: Pachiwonetsero cha Lachinayi cha Tokyo Game Show, Purezidenti wa Nintendo Satoru Iwata adavumbulutsa kamangidwe kake ka Nintendo Revolution ya kampaniyo.

en: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
ny: Monga chowonera chakutali cha kanema wawayilesi, wowongolera amagwiritsa ntchito masensa awiri omwe amayikidwa pafupi ndi kanema wawayilesi wa wogwiritsa ntchito kuti azitha kuwongolera malo ake munjira zitatu.

en: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ny: Izi zidzalola osewera kuwongolera zochita ndi mayendedwe amasewera apakanema posuntha chipangizocho mumlengalenga.

en: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
ny: Giancarlo Fisichella analephera kuyendetsa galimoto yake ndipo anamaliza mpikisano atangoyamba kumene.

en: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
ny: Mnzake Fernando Alonso ndiye adatsogola pampikisano wambiri, koma adamaliza atangoyima, mwina chifukwa gudumu lakutsogolo lakumanja linali losakhazikika bwino.

en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
ny: Michael Schumacher anamaliza mpikisano wake pasanapite nthawi yaitali kuchokera kwa Alonso, chifukwa cha kuwonongeka kwa kuyimitsidwa pankhondo zambiri pa mpikisanowu.

en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
ny: "Ndiwokongola kwambiri ndipo amayimbanso bwino," adatero malinga ndi zomwe adalemba pamsonkhano wazofalitsa.

en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
ny: "Ndinkakhudzidwa nthawi iliyonse yomwe tinkayesa izi, kuchokera pansi pa mtima wanga."

en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
ny: Pafupifupi mphindi 3 poyambitsa, kamera yomwe ili pa bolodi idawonetsa zidutswa zingapo za thovu lotsekera lomwe limachoka mu thanki yamafuta.

en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
ny: Komabe, iwo saganiziridwa kuti awononga chilichonse pa shuttle.

en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
ny: Mkulu wa pulogalamu ya shuttle ya NASA N. Wayne Hale Jr. adanena kuti chithovucho chinagwa "pambuyo pa nthawi yomwe tikuda nkhawa."

en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
ny: Mphindi zisanu muwonetsero mphepo imayamba kugudubuza mkati, pafupi mphindi imodzi pambuyo pake, mphepo ikufika 70km / h ... ndiye mvula imabwera, koma mwamphamvu komanso yaikulu kwambiri moti imawombera khungu lanu ngati singano, ndiye matalala anagwa kuchokera. kumwamba, anthu akuchita mantha ndi kukuwa ndi kuthamanga wina ndi mzake.

en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ny: Ndinataya mlongo wanga ndi bwenzi lake, ndipo m’njira munali anthu olumala awiri ali pa njinga za olumala, anthu akungodumpha ndi kuwakankha,” anatero Armand Versace.

en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
ny: NHK idanenanso kuti fakitale ya nyukiliya ya Kashiwazaki Kariwa ku Niigata prefecture imagwira ntchito bwino.

en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
ny: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. inanena kuti palibe zotsatirapo za chivomezicho komanso kuti ma reactors a Number 1 ndi 2 pa malo ake a nyukiliya a Shika adatsekedwa.

en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
ny: Akuti nyumba pafupifupi 9400 m’derali zilibe madzi ndipo pafupifupi 100 zilibe magetsi.

en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
ny: Misewu ina yawonongeka, ntchito za njanji zasokonekera m'malo omwe akhudzidwa, ndipo bwalo la ndege la Noto ku Ishikawa prefecture likadali lotsekedwa.

en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
ny: Bomba limodzi linaphulika kunja kwa ofesi ya bwanamkubwa wamkulu.

en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
ny: Mabomba ena atatu anaphulika pafupi ndi nyumba za boma m’nyengo ya maola awiri.

en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
ny: Malipoti ena amaika chiŵerengero cha anthu ophedwa pa eyiti, ndipo malipoti aboma akutsimikizira kuti mpaka 30 anavulala; koma manambala omaliza sanadziwikebe.

en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
ny: Asidi onse a cyanuric ndi melamine adapezeka m'mikodzo yochokera ku ziweto zomwe zidafa zitadya chakudya choyipa cha ziweto.

en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
ny: Mankhwala awiriwa amalumikizana wina ndi mnzake kuti apange makhiristo omwe amatha kuletsa ntchito ya impso, ofufuza ku yunivesiteyo adati.

en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
ny: Ofufuzawo adawona makhiristo opangidwa mumkodzo wamphaka powonjezera melamine ndi cyanuric acid.

en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ny: Mapangidwe a makristalowa amafanana ndi omwe amapezeka mumkodzo wa ziweto zomwe zakhudzidwa poyerekeza ndi infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
ny: Sindikudziwa ngati mukuzindikira kapena ayi, koma katundu wambiri wochokera ku Central America adabwera mdziko muno popanda msonkho.

en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
ny: Komabe makumi asanu ndi atatu pa zana aliwonse a katundu wathu adakhomeredwa misonkho kumayiko aku Central America. timakuchitirani inu.

en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
ny: Izo sizinkawoneka kukhala zanzeru kwa ine; izo ndithudi sizinali zachilungamo.

en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
ny: Zomwe ndimanena kwa anthu mumatichitira momwe timakuchitirani.

en: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
ny: Bwanamkubwa waku California Arnold Schwarzenegger adasaina lamulo loletsa kugulitsa kapena kubwereketsa masewera achiwawa achiwawa kwa ana.

en: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
ny: Biliyo ikufuna kuti masewera apakanema achiwawa omwe amagulitsidwa ku California alembedwe mawu oti "18" ndikupangitsa kugulitsa kwawo kwa mwana wamng'ono kuti alangidwe ndi chindapusa cha $1000 pamlandu uliwonse.

en: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
ny: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, adapereka mawu m'mawa uno akulengeza kuti akuimbidwa mlandu a Huhne ndi Pryce.

en: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
ny: Huhne wasiya ntchito ndipo asinthidwa mu nduna ndi Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP akuyembekezeka kutenga nduna ya Bizinesi Davey akuchoka.

en: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
ny: Huhne ndi Pryce akuyembekezeka kukaonekera kukhoti la Westminster Magistrates Court pa February 16.

en: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
ny: Ophedwawo anali Nicholas Alden, 25, ndi Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback anali dalaivala.

en: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
ny: Edgar Veguilla adalandira mabala amkono ndi nsagwada pomwe Kristoffer Schneider adasiyidwa akufunika opaleshoni yokonzanso nkhope yake.

en: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
ny: Chida cha Uka chinalephera pamene chinaloza mutu wa munthu wachisanu. Schneider amamva kupweteka kosalekeza, khungu m'diso limodzi, gawo losowa la chigaza komanso nkhope yomangidwanso ndi titaniyamu.

en: Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
ny: Schneider adachitira umboni kudzera pa videolink kuchokera ku USAF komwe amakhala kwawo.

en: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
ny: Pambuyo pa chochitika cha Lachitatu, Carpanedo adachita nawo mipikisano iwiri pa Championships.

en: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
ny: Woyamba anali Slalom, komwe adapeza Did Not Finish pakuthamanga kwake koyamba. 36 mwa opikisana nawo 116 anali ndi zotsatira zofanana pa mpikisanowo.

en: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
ny: Mpikisano wake wina, Giant Slalom, adamuwona akumaliza pa nambala 10 pagulu la azimayi omwe ali ndi nthawi yothamanga ya 4:41.30, 2:11.60 mphindi pang'onopang'ono kuposa womaliza malo oyamba, Claudia Loesch ndi mphindi 1:09.02 pang'onopang'ono kuposa malo achisanu ndi chinayi. womaliza Gyöngyi Dani waku Hungary.

en: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
ny: Otsetsereka anayi mugulu la sitting la azimayi adalephera kumaliza mpikisano wawo, ndipo 45 mwa 117 onse otsetsereka mu Giant Slalom adalephera kusanja mu mpikisanowo.

en: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
ny: Apolisi a Madhya Pradesh adapezanso laputopu ndi foni yomwe idabedwa.

en: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".
ny: Wachiwiri kwa Inspector General DK Arya adati, "Tamanga anthu asanu omwe adagwiririra mzimayi waku Switzerland ndikumulanda foni ndi laputopu yake".

en: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.
ny: Oimbidwa mlandu ndi Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar ndi Vishnu Kanjar.

en: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
ny: Superintendent wa polisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki wati woimbidwa mlandu adakaonekera kubwalo lamilandu ataphimba nkhope.

en: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
ny: Ngakhale kuti anthu atatu anali m’nyumbamo pamene galimotoyo inagunda, palibe amene anavulala.

en: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
ny: Komabe dalaivalayo anavulala kwambiri m’mutu.

en: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT.
ny: Msewu womwe ngoziyi idachitika idatsekedwa kwakanthawi pomwe ntchito zadzidzidzi zidamasula dalaivala ku Audi TT yofiira.

en: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
ny: Poyamba adagonekedwa m'chipatala cha James Paget ku Great Yarmouth.

en: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ny: Pambuyo pake adasamutsidwa ku chipatala cha Addenbrooke ku Cambridge.

en: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
ny: Adekoya wakhala ali ku Edinburgh Sheriff Court akuimbidwa mlandu wopha mwana wake wamwamuna.

en: She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published.
ny: Ali m'ndende kudikirira kuti anene mlandu komanso kuzengedwa mlandu, koma umboni uliwonse wowona ndi maso ukhoza kukhala wodetsedwa chifukwa chithunzi chake chafalitsidwa kwambiri.
