en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
ny: Maseŵera otsetsereka a chipale chofewa, omwe amaphatikizapo kutsetsereka ndi kutsetsereka pa chipale chofewa, ndi masewera otchuka omwe amaphatikizapo kutsetsereka pansi pa chipale chofewa ndi skis kapena bolodi la chipale chofewa kumapazi anu.

en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
ny: Skiing ndi ntchito yayikulu yoyendayenda yokhala ndi anthu ambiri okonda, omwe nthawi zina amatchedwa "ski bums," akukonzekera tchuthi chonse kuzungulira malo enaake.

en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
ny: Lingaliro la skiing ndi lachikale kwambiri - zojambula zapaphanga zosonyeza anthu otsetsereka m'madzi kuyambira 5000 BC!

en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ny: Kutsika pansi ngati masewera kumayambira zaka za m'ma 1700, ndipo mu 1861 kalabu yoyamba yosangalatsa ya ski idatsegulidwa ndi aku Norwegi ku Australia.

en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
ny: Kupakira kumbuyo ndi ski: Ntchitoyi imatchedwanso backcountry ski, ski tour kapena skiinging.

en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
ny: Ndizogwirizana koma nthawi zambiri sizimakhudza mayendedwe otsetsereka a m'mapiri kapena kukwera mapiri, zotsirizirazi zimachitika pamalo otsetsereka ndipo zimafuna maski olimba kwambiri ndi nsapato.

en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
ny: Ganizirani za njira ya skiing ngati njira yofananira yodutsamo.

en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ny: M'malo abwino, mutha kuyenda mtunda wautali kuposa kuyenda - koma nthawi zambiri simudzapeza kuthamanga kwamasewera otsetsereka popanda chikwama cholemera mumayendedwe okongoletsedwa.

en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
ny: Europe ndi kontinenti yomwe ndi yaing'ono koma yokhala ndi mayiko ambiri odziyimira pawokha. Munthawi yanthawi zonse, kuyenda m'maiko angapo kungatanthauze kudutsa ma visa ndikuwongolera mapasipoti kangapo.

en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
ny: Chigawo cha Schengen, komabe, chimagwira ntchito ngati dziko limodzi pankhaniyi.

en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
ny: Malingana ngati mukukhala mderali, mutha kuwoloka malire osadutsanso poyang'anira pasipoti.

en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
ny: Mofananamo, pokhala ndi visa ya Schengen, simukuyenera kuitanitsa ma visa ku mayiko onse a Schengen padera, motero kusunga nthawi, ndalama ndi mapepala.

en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
ny: Palibe kutanthauzira konsekonse komwe zinthu zopangidwa ndi zakale. Mabungwe ena amisonkho amatanthauzira zinthu zakale kuposa zaka 100 ngati zakale.

en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
ny: Tanthauzoli liri ndi kusiyana kwa malo, kumene malire a zaka angakhale aafupi m'malo monga North America kusiyana ndi ku Ulaya.

en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
ny: Zogulitsa pamanja zitha kufotokozedwa ngati zakale, ngakhale ndizocheperako poyerekeza ndi zinthu zomwe zimapangidwa mochuluka.

en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
ny: Kuweta ng'ombe ndizofunikira kwambiri pamoyo wa anthu amtundu wa Sámi ndipo chikhalidwe chozungulira malonda ndi chofunikira kwa ambiri omwe ali ndi ntchito zina.

en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
ny: Komabe, ngakhale mwamwambo, si a Sámi onse amene akhala akuweta mphala zazikulu, koma ankakhala ndi usodzi, kusaka ndi zina zotero, pokhala ndi nyama zambiri zokoka nyama.

en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
ny: Masiku ano Asami ambiri amagwira ntchito zamalonda zamakono. Tourism ndi ndalama zofunika kwambiri ku Sápmi, dera la Sámi.

en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
ny: Ngakhale kuti amagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri, makamaka kwa anthu omwe si Aromani, liwu loti "Gypsy" nthawi zambiri limawonedwa ngati lonyansa chifukwa chogwirizana ndi malingaliro oyipa komanso malingaliro olakwika a anthu aku Aromani.

en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
ny: Ngati dziko lomwe mukupitako likhala pansi pa upangiri wapaulendo, inshuwaransi yanu yazaumoyo kapena inshuwaransi yoletsa ulendo wanu ingakhudzidwe.

en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
ny: Mwinanso mungafune kufunsa upangiri wa maboma ena osati anu, koma malangizo awo adapangidwira nzika zawo.

en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
ny: Mwachitsanzo, nzika zaku America ku Middle East zitha kukumana ndi mikhalidwe yosiyana kuchokera kwa Azungu kapena Aarabu.

en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
ny: Uphungu ndi chidule chachidule cha mkhalidwe wa ndale m’dziko limodzi.

en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ny: Malingaliro omwe amaperekedwa nthawi zambiri amakhala achipongwe, osavuta komanso osavuta kuyerekeza ndi zambiri zomwe zimapezeka kwina.

en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
ny: Nyengo yoopsa ndi mawu odziwika bwino anyengo iliyonse yowopsa yomwe imatha kuwononga, kusokoneza kwambiri anthu, kapena kutaya moyo wamunthu.

en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
ny: Nyengo yoopsa imatha kuchitika kulikonse padziko lapansi, ndipo pali mitundu yosiyanasiyana, yomwe ingadalire madera, malo, ndi mlengalenga.

en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
ny: Mphepo yamkuntho, matalala, mvula yambiri, ndi moto wolusa ndi mawonekedwe ndi zotsatira za nyengo yoopsa, monga momwe zimakhalira mabingu, mvula yamkuntho, mitsinje yamadzi, ndi mvula yamkuntho.

en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
ny: Zochitika zanyengo zam'madera ndi nyengo zowopsa zimaphatikizapo mvula yamkuntho, chipale chofewa, namondwe wa ayezi, ndi mkuntho wafumbi.

en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
ny: Apaulendo akulangizidwa mwamphamvu kuti adziwe zoopsa zilizonse zomwe zingakhudze dera lawo chifukwa zingakhudze mapulani aliwonse oyenda.

en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
ny: Aliyense amene akukonzekera ulendo wopita kudziko lomwe lingathe kuonedwa ngati malo ankhondo ayenera kupeza maphunziro apamwamba.

en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
ny: Kusaka pa intaneti kwa 'Hostile environment course' kungapereke adilesi ya kampani yakomweko.

en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
ny: Kosi nthawi zambiri idzafotokoza zonse zomwe zafotokozedwa pano mwatsatanetsatane, nthawi zambiri ndi zochitika zenizeni.

en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
ny: Maphunzirowa nthawi zambiri amakhala kuyambira masiku 2 mpaka 5 ndipo amakhala ngati sewero, thandizo loyamba komanso nthawi zina kuphunzitsa zida.

en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
ny: Mabuku ndi magazini okhudza kupulumuka m’chipululu ndi ofala, koma zofalitsa zonena za madera ankhondo ndi ochepa.

en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
ny: Oyenda omwe akukonzekera opareshoni yobwereranso kumayiko ena akuyenera kuwonetsetsa kuti ali ndi zikalata zovomerezeka zaulendo wobwerera.

en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
ny: Kufunitsitsa kwa maboma kuti apereke mapasipoti opanda jenda (X) kapena zolemba zomwe zasinthidwa kuti zigwirizane ndi dzina lomwe mukufuna komanso jenda zimasiyana.

en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
ny: Kufunitsitsa kwa maboma akunja kulemekeza zikalatazi kukusinthasinthanso.

en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
ny: Kusaka m'malo oyang'anira chitetezo kwakhala kovutiranso kwambiri pambuyo pa Seputembara 11, 2001.

en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
ny: Pre-operative transgender anthu sayenera kuyembekezera kudutsa masikeloni ndi zinsinsi zawo komanso ulemu wawo.

en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
ny: Mafunde amadzimadzi amabwereranso kuchokera ku mafunde akusweka pagombe, nthawi zambiri pamatanthwe kapena ofanana.

en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
ny: Chifukwa cha topology yamadzi apansi pamadzi kutuluka kwamadzi kumakhazikika pazigawo zingapo zakuya, ndipo kuthamanga kwamadzi akuya kumatha kupanga pamenepo.

en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
ny: Imfa zambiri zimachitika chifukwa cha kutopa poyesa kusambira kuti abwerere motsutsana ndi zomwe zikuchitika, zomwe zingakhale zosatheka.

en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
ny: Mukangotuluka pakali pano, kusambira kumbuyo sikuli kovuta kuposa momwe mumakhalira.

en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
ny: Yesani kuloza kwinakwake komwe simunagwidwenso kapena, kutengera luso lanu komanso ngati mwawonedwa, mungafune kudikirira kupulumutsidwa.

en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
ny: Kugwedezeka kwa kulowanso kumabwera posachedwa kusiyana ndi chikhalidwe chododometsa (pamakhala zochepa za gawo la honeymoon), kumatenga nthawi yaitali, ndipo kungakhale koopsa kwambiri.

en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
ny: Anthu apaulendo amene anavutika kuzoloŵera chikhalidwe chatsopanocho nthaŵi zina amavutika kuti azolowere chikhalidwe chawo.

en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
ny: Mutabwerera kunyumba mutakhala kunja, munazolowera chikhalidwe chatsopanocho ndipo mwasiya zina ndi zikhalidwe za kwanuko.

en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
ny: Pamene munapita kudziko lina poyamba, mwinamwake anthu anali oleza mtima ndi omvetsetsa, podziŵa kuti apaulendo a m’dziko latsopano afunikira kuzoloŵera.

en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
ny: Anthu sangayembekezere kuti kuleza mtima ndi kumvetsetsa n’kofunikanso kwa apaulendo obwerera kwawo.

en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
ny: Phokoso la piramidi ndi chiwonetsero chowala ndi chimodzi mwazinthu zosangalatsa kwambiri m'derali kwa ana.

en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
ny: Mutha kuwona mapiramidi mumdima ndipo mutha kuwawona ali chete chiwonetsero chisanayambe.

en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
ny: Kawirikawiri inu nthawizonse pano phokoso la alendo ndi ogulitsa. Nkhani ya mawu ndi kuwala ili ngati buku la nkhani.

en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
ny: Sphinx imayikidwa ngati maziko komanso wofotokozera nkhani yayitali.

en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
ny: Zithunzizi zikuwonetsedwa pa mapiramidi ndipo mapiramidi osiyanasiyana amawunikira.

en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
ny: Zilumba za South Shetland, zomwe zidapezeka mu 1819, zimanenedwa ndi mayiko angapo ndipo zili ndi maziko ambiri, khumi ndi asanu ndi limodzi akugwira ntchito mu 2020.

en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
ny: Zisumbuzi zili pamtunda wa makilomita 120 kumpoto kwa Peninsula. Chachikulu kwambiri ndi King George Island chokhala ndi Villa Las Estrellas.

en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
ny: Ena akuphatikizapo Livingston Island, ndi Deception komwe malo osefukira a phiri lophulika lomwe laphulika limapereka doko lachilengedwe lochititsa chidwi.

en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
ny: Ellsworth Land ndi dera lomwe lili kumwera kwa Peninsula, lomwe lili m'mphepete mwa Nyanja ya Bellingshausen.

en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
ny: Mapiri a Peninsula pano amaphatikizana ndi phirilo, kenako amatulukanso kuti apange unyolo wa 360 km wa mapiri a Ellsworth, ophatikizidwa ndi Glacier ya Minnesota.

en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
ny: Mbali yakumpoto kapena Sentinel Range ili ndi mapiri aatali kwambiri ku Antarctica, Vinson Massif, omwe amafika pamtunda wa 4892 m Mount Vinson.

en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
ny: Kumalo akutali, popanda kulumikizidwa ndi foni yam'manja, foni ya satellite ikhoza kukhala njira yanu yokhayo.

en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
ny: Foni ya satellite si nthawi zambiri yolowa m'malo mwa foni yam'manja, chifukwa umayenera kukhala panja ndi mawonekedwe omveka bwino kuti uimbe foni.

en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
ny: Ntchitoyi imagwiritsidwa ntchito pafupipafupi potumiza, kuphatikiza ntchito zosangalatsa, komanso maulendo omwe ali ndi data yakutali komanso zosowa zamawu.

en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
ny: Othandizira mafoni a m'dera lanu akuyenera kukupatsani zambiri zokhudzana ndi kulumikizana ndi ntchitoyi.

en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
ny: Njira yomwe ikuchulukirachulukira kwa iwo omwe akukonzekera chaka chosiyana ndikuyenda ndikuphunzira.

en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
ny: Izi ndizodziwika makamaka kwa omwe amasiya sukulu, zomwe zimawalola kuti azikhala ndi chaka chimodzi asanafike ku yunivesite, osasokoneza maphunziro awo.

en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
ny: Nthawi zambiri, kulembetsa maphunziro azaka zapakati kudziko lina kumatha kukulitsa mwayi wanu wopita ku maphunziro apamwamba kudziko lanu.

en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
ny: Nthawi zambiri pamakhala chindapusa kuti mulembetse m'mapulogalamu ophunzirira awa.

en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
ny: Finland ndi malo abwino kwambiri opitako. "Dziko la nyanja chikwi" lilinso ndi zisumbu zambiri, m'nyanja ndi m'mphepete mwa nyanja.

en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
ny: M'zilumba ndi m'nyanja simusowa yacht.

en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
ny: Ngakhale zisumbu za m'mphepete mwa nyanja ndi nyanja zazikuluzikulu ndizokwanira kuti ma yacht aliwonse, mabwato ang'onoang'ono kapena kayak amapereka zina.

en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
ny: Kuyenda pa boti ndi masewera adziko lonse ku Finland, ndipo boti limapita kwa anthu asanu ndi awiri kapena asanu ndi atatu aliwonse.

en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
ny: Izi zikufanana ndi Norway, Sweden ndi New Zealand, koma mosiyana kwambiri (mwachitsanzo ku Netherlands chiwerengerochi ndi chimodzi mpaka makumi anayi).

en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
ny: Ambiri mwa maulendo apanyanja a Baltic Cruise amakhala nthawi yaitali ku St. Petersburg, Russia.

en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
ny: Izi zikutanthauza kuti mutha kuyendera mzinda wakalewu kwa masiku angapo mukubwerera ndikugona m'sitimayo usiku.

en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
ny: Mukangopita kumtunda pogwiritsa ntchito maulendo apanyanja simudzasowa visa yosiyana (monga 2009).

en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
ny: Maulendo ena amawonetsa Berlin, Germany m'mabulosha. Monga mukuwonera pamapu omwe ali pamwamba pa Berlin palibe komwe kuli pafupi ndi nyanja ndipo kuyendera mzindawu sikuphatikizidwa pamtengo wapaulendo.

en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
ny: Kuyenda pandege kumatha kukhala kowopsa kwa anthu amisinkhu yonse komanso azikhalidwe zosiyanasiyana, makamaka ngati sanawulukepo kapena adakumanapo ndi zoopsa.

en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
ny: Sichinthu chochititsa manyazi: sichisiyana ndi mantha aumwini ndi kusakonda zinthu zina zomwe anthu ambiri ali nazo.

en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
ny: Kwa ena, kumvetsetsa mmene ndege zimagwirira ntchito ndi zimene zimachitika paulendo wa pandege kungathandize kuthetsa mantha ozikidwa pa zinthu zosadziwika kapena kulephera kulamulira.

en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
ny: Makampani a Courier amalipidwa bwino popereka zinthu mwachangu. Nthawi zambiri, nthawi ndiyofunikira kwambiri ndi zolemba zamabizinesi, malonda kapena zida zosinthira mwachangu.

en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
ny: Panjira zina, makampani akuluakulu ali ndi ndege zawo, koma njira zina ndi makampani ang'onoang'ono panali vuto.

en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
ny: Ngati anatumiza zinthu pa ndege, m’njira zina zingatenge masiku ambiri kuti adutse katundu ndi masitomu.

en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
ny: Njira yokhayo yodutsira mwachangu inali kutumiza ngati chikwama chofufuzidwa. Malamulo a ndege sangawalole kutumiza katundu popanda wokwera, komwe mumalowa.

en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
ny: Njira yodziwikiratu yowuluka koyamba kapena kalasi yamabizinesi ndikuchotsa ndalama zambiri kuti mupeze mwayi (kapena, chabwino komabe, pezani kampani yanu kuti ikuchitireni).

en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
ny: Komabe, izi sizitsika mtengo: monga malamulo okhwima, mutha kuyembekezera kulipira kuwirikiza kanayi ndalama zolipirira bizinesi, komanso kakhumi ndi chimodzi pakalasi yoyamba!

en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
ny: Nthawi zambiri, palibe chifukwa choyang'ana kuchotsera kwabizinesi kapena mipando yapamwamba pamaulendo apandege kuchokera ku A kupita ku B.

en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
ny: Oyendetsa ndege amadziwa bwino kuti pali gulu linalake laowuluka omwe ali okonzeka kulipira dola yapamwamba kuti akhale ndi mwayi wopita kwinakwake mwachangu komanso mwachitonthozo, ndikulipira moyenerera.

en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
ny: Likulu la Moldova ndi Chişinău. Chilankhulo cha komweko ndi Chiromania, koma Chirasha chimagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri.

en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
ny: Moldova ndi lipabuliki yamitundu yambiri yomwe yavutika ndi mikangano yamitundu.

en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
ny: Mu 1994, mkangano umenewu unachititsa kuti dziko lotchedwa Transnistria Republic likhazikitsidwe kum'mawa kwa Moldova, lomwe lili ndi boma ndi ndalama zake koma silikudziwika ndi dziko lililonse la UN.

en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
ny: Maulalo azachuma akhazikitsidwanso pakati pa magawo awiriwa a Moldova ngakhale kuti zokambirana za ndale zalephera.

en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
ny: Chipembedzo chachikulu ku Moldova ndi Chikhristu cha Orthodox.

en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
ny: İzmir ndi mzinda wachitatu waukulu kwambiri ku Turkey wokhala ndi anthu pafupifupi 3.7 miliyoni, doko lachiwiri lalikulu kwambiri pambuyo pa Istanbul, komanso mayendedwe abwino kwambiri.

en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
ny: Poyamba unali mzinda wakale wa Smurna, tsopano uli malo amalonda amakono, otukuka, ndi otanganidwa, ozunguliridwa ndi gombe lalikulu ndi lozunguliridwa ndi mapiri.

en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ny: Mabwalo otakata, nyumba zoyang'aniridwa ndi magalasi komanso malo ogulitsira amakono ali ndi madenga amiyala ofiira, msika wazaka za zana la 18, ndi mizikiti yakale ndi matchalitchi, ngakhale mzindawu uli ndi malo ambiri ku Mediterranean Europe kuposa chikhalidwe cha Turkey.

en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
ny: Mudzi wa Haldersvík umapereka malingaliro achilumba chapafupi ndi Eysturoy ndipo uli ndi tchalitchi chachilendo cha octagonal.

en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
ny: M’bwalo la tchalitchi muli ziboliboli zochititsa chidwi za nsangalabwi za nkhunda pamwamba pa manda ena.

en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
ny: Ndikofunikira theka la ola kuyenda mozungulira mudzi wochititsa chidwiwu.

en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
ny: Kumpoto komanso komwe kuli kosavuta kufikako ndi tauni yachikondi komanso yosangalatsa ya Sintra yomwe idadziwika kwa alendo akunja pambuyo pa mbiri yowoneka bwino ya kukongola kwake yolembedwa ndi Lord Byron.

en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
ny: Scotturb Bus 403 imayenda pafupipafupi kupita ku Sintra, kuyima ku Cabo da Roca.

en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
ny: Komanso kumpoto pitani ku Sanctuary yayikulu ya Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), malo omwe amawonekera padziko lonse lapansi a Marian.

en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
ny: Chonde kumbukirani kuti mukupita ku manda a anthu ambiri, komanso malo omwe ali ndi tanthauzo losawerengeka kwa anthu ambiri padziko lapansi.

en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
ny: Pakali amuna ndi akazi ambiri amene anapulumuka m’nthaŵi yawo pano, ndi enanso ambiri amene anali ndi okondedwa awo amene anaphedwa kapena kugwira ntchito mpaka kufa kumeneko, Ayuda ndi osakhala Ayuda mofananamo.

en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
ny: Chonde chitirani tsambali mwaulemu, ulemu ndi ulemu womwe ukuyenera. Osachita nthabwala za Holocaust kapena Nazi.

en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
ny: Osaipitsa tsambalo polemba kapena kukanda zojambulajambula muzomanga.

en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
ny: Zilankhulo zovomerezeka ku Barcelona ndi Catalan ndi Spanish. Pafupifupi theka amakonda kulankhula Chikatalani, ambiri amachimvetsa, ndipo pafupifupi aliyense amadziwa Chisipanishi.

en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
ny: Komabe, zizindikiro zambiri zimangosonyezedwa m’Chikatalani chifukwa chimakhazikitsidwa ndi lamulo monga chinenero choyamba chovomerezeka.

en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
ny: Komabe, Chisipanishi chimagwiritsidwanso ntchito kwambiri m'mayendedwe apagulu ndi m'malo ena.

en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ny: Zilengezo zanthawi zonse mu Metro zimapangidwa m’Chikatalani chokha, koma zosokoneza zosakonzekera zimalengezedwa ndi makina odzichitira okha m’zinenero zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo Chisipanishi, Chingelezi, Chifulenchi, Chiarabu ndi Chijapanizi.

en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
ny: Anthu a ku Parisi amadziwika kuti ndi odzikonda, amwano komanso odzikuza.

en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
ny: Ngakhale kuti izi nthawi zambiri zimakhala zolakwika, njira yabwino yokhalira limodzi ku Paris ndikukhala pa khalidwe lanu labwino, kuchita ngati munthu yemwe ali "bien élevé" (woleredwa bwino). Zidzapangitsa kukhala kosavuta kwambiri.

en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
ny: Kunja kwadzidzidzi kwa anthu a ku Parisi kumasefukira ngati muwonetsa ulemu.

en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
ny: Paki ya Plitvice Lakes ili ndi nkhalango zambiri, makamaka ndi mitengo ya beech, spruce, ndi fir, ndipo imakhala ndi zomera zosakanikirana za Alpine ndi Mediterranean.

en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
ny: Ili ndi mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya zomera, chifukwa cha kusiyanasiyana kwa ma microclimates, dothi losiyanasiyana komanso kutalika kwake.

en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
ny: M’derali mulinso mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya nyama ndi mbalame.

en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ny: Nyama zosowa monga zimbalangondo zofiirira za ku Europe, nkhandwe, chiwombankhanga, kadzidzi, lynx, mphaka wakuthengo ndi capercaillie, pamodzi ndi zamoyo zambiri zodziwika bwino.

en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
ny: Akamayendera nyumba za amonke, amayi amafunika kuvala masiketi ophimba mawondo ndi kuphimba mapewa awo.

en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
ny: Nyumba zambiri za amonke zimapereka zophimba kwa amayi omwe amabwera osakonzekera, koma ngati mubweretsa anu, makamaka omwe ali ndi mitundu yowala, mudzapeza kumwetulira kuchokera kwa amonke kapena sisitere pakhomo.

en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
ny: Pa mzere womwewo, amuna amafunika kuvala mathalauza ophimba mawondo.

en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
ny: Izi nazonso zitha kubwerekedwa ku katundu wapakhomo koma zovala sizichapidwa pambuyo pa wogwiritsa ntchito aliyense kuti musamve bwino kuvala masiketi awa. Kukula kumodzi kumakwanira amuna onse!

en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
ny: Zakudya za Majorcan, monga za madera ofanana ku Mediterranean, zimachokera ku mkate, masamba ndi nyama (makamaka nkhumba), ndipo amagwiritsa ntchito mafuta a azitona ponseponse.

en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
ny: Chakudya chosavuta chodziwika bwino, makamaka nthawi yachilimwe, ndi Pa amb Oli: Mkate wokhala ndi mafuta a azitona, phwetekere, ndi zokometsera zilizonse zomwe zilipo monga tchizi, tunafish, etc.

en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
ny: Maina onse, pamodzi ndi liwu lakuti Sie kwa inu, nthawi zonse amayamba ndi chilembo chachikulu, ngakhale pakati pa chiganizo.

en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
ny: Iyi ndi njira yofunika kusiyanitsa pakati pa maverebu ena ndi zinthu.

en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
ny: Zimapangitsanso kuti kuwerenga kukhale kosavuta, ngakhale kulemba kumakhala kovuta chifukwa chofuna kudziwa ngati mneni kapena adjective amagwiritsidwa ntchito mu mawonekedwe ovomerezeka.

en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
ny: Katchulidwe ka mawu ndi kosavuta m'Chitaliyana popeza mawu ambiri amatchulidwa ndendende momwe amalembedwera

en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
ny: Zilembo zazikulu zomwe muyenera kusamala nazo ndi c ndi g, chifukwa matchulidwe ake amasiyanasiyana malinga ndi mavawelo otsatirawa.

en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
ny: Komanso, onetsetsani kuti mumatchula r ndi rr mosiyana: caro amatanthauza wokondedwa, pamene carro amatanthauza galeta.

en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
ny: Chiperisiya chili ndi galamala yosavuta komanso yokhazikika.

en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
ny: Chifukwa chake, kuwerenga choyambira cha galamalachi kungakuthandizeni kuphunzira zambiri za galamala yaku Perisiya ndikumvetsetsa bwino mawu.

en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
ny: Mosakayikira, ngati mumadziwa chinenero cha Chiromance, kudzakhala kosavuta kuti muphunzire Chipwitikizi.

en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
ny: Komabe, anthu amene amadziŵa Chisipanishi pang’ono angaganize mopupuluma kuti Chipwitikizi n’chapafupi kwambiri moti sitiyenera kuchiphunzira paokha.

en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
ny: Malo owonera zakale akale nthawi zambiri satha masiku ano, ndipo amakhalabe ngati malo osungiramo zinthu zakale, kapena malo ophunzirira.

en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
ny: Popeza kuipitsidwa kopepuka m’nthaŵi yawo yachitukuko sikunali vuto la mtundu wamakono, kaŵirikaŵiri amakhala m’mizinda kapena m’masukulu, osavuta kufikako kuposa amene amamangidwa m’nthaŵi zamakono.

en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ny: Ma telesikopu ambiri amakono ofufuza ndi malo akuluakulu kumadera akutali okhala ndi mpweya wabwino.

en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
ny: Kuwona kwa Cherry blossom, komwe kumadziwika kuti hanami, kwakhala gawo la chikhalidwe cha ku Japan kuyambira zaka za zana lachisanu ndi chitatu.

en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
ny: Lingalirolo linachokera ku China kumene maluwa a plums anali duwa losankhika.

en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
ny: Ku Japan, maphwando oyamba a maluwa a chitumbuwa adachitiridwa ndi mfumu yekhayo ndi mamembala ena achifumu kuzungulira Bwalo la Imperial.

en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
ny: Zomera zimawoneka bwino kwambiri zikakhala m'malo achilengedwe, choncho pewani chiyeso chochotsa ngakhale "chitsanzo chimodzi".

en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
ny: Ngati kuyendera dimba lokonzedwa bwino, kusonkhanitsa "zitsanzo" kudzakutulutsani, popanda kukambirana.

en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
ny: Singapore nthawi zambiri ndi malo otetezeka kwambiri komanso osavuta kuyendamo, ndipo mutha kugula chilichonse mukafika.

en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
ny: Koma kuikidwa mu "malo otentha kwambiri" madigiri ochepa chabe kumpoto kwa equator mudzafunika kuthana ndi kutentha (nthawi zonse) ndi dzuwa lamphamvu (pamene thambo liri loyera, kawirikawiri).

en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
ny: Palinso mabasi opita kumpoto ku Hebroni, malo oikidwa mwamwambo a makolo akale a m’Baibulo Abrahamu, Isake, Yakobo, ndi akazi awo.

en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
ny: Onetsetsani kuti basi yomwe mukuganiza kukwera ikupita ku Hebroni osati kumudzi wapafupi wa Ayuda wa Kiryat Arba.

en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
ny: Mitsinje yam'madzi imatha kukhala mutu wabwino woyambira tchuthi mozungulira.

en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
ny: Mwachitsanzo kuyendera nyumba zachifumu m'chigwa cha Loire, chigwa cha Rhine kapena kuyenda panyanja kupita kumalo osangalatsa a Danube kapena kukwera ngalawa m'mphepete mwa Erie Canal.

en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
ny: Amatanthauziranso njira zamayendedwe otchuka okwera ndi kupalasa njinga.

en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
ny: Khrisimasi ndi imodzi mwa maholide ofunika kwambiri achikhristu, ndipo amakumbukiridwa kuti ndi tsiku la kubadwa kwa Yesu.

en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
ny: Miyambo yambiri yozungulira holideyi yatengedwanso ndi osakhulupirira m’mayiko achikhristu komanso anthu omwe si Akhristu padziko lonse lapansi.

en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
ny: Pali mwambo wodutsa usiku wa Isitala uli maso pamalo ena owonekera kuti muwone kutuluka kwa dzuwa.

en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
ny: Pali zofotokozera zamulungu zachikhristu pamwambowu, koma ukhoza kukhala mwambo wa Chikhristu chisanayambe komanso mwambo wakubala.

en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ny: Mipingo yambiri yamwambo nthawi zambiri imakhala ndi Vigil ya Isitala Loweruka usiku pa Loweruka la sabata la Isitala, ndipo mipingo nthawi zambiri imakondwerera pakati pausiku kuti ikondwerere kuuka kwa Khristu.

en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
ny: Nyama zonse zomwe zidafika pachilumbachi zidabwera kuno posambira, kuwuluka kapena kuyandama.

en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
ny: Chifukwa cha mtunda wautali kuchokera ku kontinenti nyama zoyamwitsa sizinathe kuyenda ulendowu zomwe zimapangitsa kamba wamkulu kukhala nyama yoyamba yodyetsera ku Galapagos.

en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
ny: Kuyambira kufika kwa munthu ku Galapagos, nyama zambiri zoyamwitsa zakhala zikudziwika kuphatikizapo mbuzi, akavalo, ng'ombe, makoswe, amphaka ndi agalu.

en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
ny: Mukapita kumadera a ku Arctic kapena ku Antarctic m'nyengo yozizira mudzapeza usiku wa polar, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti dzuŵa silituluka pamwamba.

en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
ny: Izi zimapereka mwayi wabwino kuti muwone borealis ya Aurora, popeza thambo lidzakhala lakuda mochuluka kapena mocheperapo nthawi yonseyi.

en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ny: Popeza madera ali ndi anthu ochepa, komanso kuwonongeka kwa kuwala kotero nthawi zambiri sikumakhala vuto, mudzatha kusangalala ndi nyenyezi.

en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
ny: Chikhalidwe cha ntchito za ku Japan ndi chapamwamba komanso chokhazikika monga momwe anthu akumadzulo angagwiritsire ntchito.

en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
ny: Zovala ndizovala zamalonda, ndipo ogwira nawo ntchito amatchula mayina a mabanja awo kapena maudindo a ntchito.

en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
ny: Kugwirizana kwa kuntchito n'kofunika kwambiri, kutsindika khama la gulu m'malo moyamikira zomwe munthu wachita.

en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
ny: Ogwira ntchito nthawi zambiri amayenera kupeza chivomerezo cha akuluakulu awo pazisankho zilizonse zomwe apanga, ndipo amayembekezeredwa kumvera malangizo a mabwana awo popanda kufunsa mafunso.
